Royal Avila Boutique Resort Perched atop the majestic cliffs, an alluring volcanic hill overlooking Malimbu beach, Royal Avila offers warmth and intimate tropical Mediterranean-inspired stays in the elegance and exceptional kindness of Indonesian hospitality. Nestled within 2.5 hectares of lush tranquility this modern resort is a quintessential blend of authentic Indonesian and International sensibilities. With 54 all-suites accommodation provide a sensorial experience of Lombok with remarkable sightlines, intuitive amenities, and emotionally rewarding encounters.
